message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $17,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident it will be worth every penny for you. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only willing to pay up to $15,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
Bob, I understand your position. I'm willing to come down a bit to $16,000. It's still a fair price considering the value of the product. I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with a price of $15,500 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise that respects the value of your product while staying within my budget.
